attributes.action: Review the discharge of Tazer weapons  by the police,  and injury  caused to innocent  victims of their use
attributes.additional_details:
Please review  the use  and abuse of Tazer weapons  by the police.

Please consider  prosecuting officers  for GBH, murder or manslaughter,  or an alternative  charge,  when it is believed that they  have   wrongly  assaulted  innocent persons.

Have a moratorium on police officers routinely carrying "Tazer"  weapons  while this review is being carried out, please.
